channel.title: Need help on making max stat 135
channel.description: need help please im willing 2 give dem admin as a reward on my good server :mad:

item.title: Need help on making max stat 135
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;

}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on making max stat 135

item.title: Need help on making max stat 135
item.dc:creator: @W_W_E W W E
item.description:
@W_W_E wrote:

k, i dont want anything in return but

serch for return (and what you max stat lvl currently is) in your Client.java. foe exp.

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 130; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 130;[/code]

where is says return 130; thats your max stat lvl, you can change it to anything you want.
